website_summaries.verdict: Backpack cooler does a good job of not leaking and keeping things cool for a decent period of time.
pros: Holds ice for a good amount of time
Doesn't sweat when you are hiking
Backpack straps are well made and comfortable
cons: This model is not very large
It is designed to hold 24 cans, but will do better with about half that amount

customer_reviews.title: Keeps Beer Cold
customer_reviews.text: This bag is great. Kept drinks cold all day and ice lasted most of the day in Florida heat. I was able to hide 8 cans of beer at the bottom covered with cans of soda and get into all 5 Disney parks, Epcot, Magic Kingdom, Studios, Animal Kingdom and Typhoon Lagoon. It did the job!
customer_reviews.author: Ed Parry

customer_reviews.title: (Ice pack is still frozen at the end of the work day {12hrs}) Pretty sturdy pack so far
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for a few weeks for work, and it holds everything I needed. Keeps my food and water cold all day. (Ice pack is still frozen at the end of the work day {12hrs}) Pretty sturdy pack so far!
customer_reviews.author: M35A2 Deuce

customer_reviews.title: Plenty of space but fell apart quickly.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband. It’s a great bag as far as the size goes, it does keep everything cool well, but after just 2 months the seam is already splitting around the zipper on the lid which is sad since it’s been such a short time & because of the cost. I wish we could get a replacement!
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: great for kayaking as well will float
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this to use in Keys on vacation. Collapsible and fits in my check in luggage no problem. It does leak a little but acceptable for me. Keeps ice all day on beach, great for kayaking as well will float.
customer_reviews.author: John B.

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. Tested it out over the weekend at a ...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Tested it out over the weekend at a neighborhood party before I take it down to the beach next weekend. I loaded it up with about 15 beers and a good amount of ice. I pretty much kept it on my back the entire time (over 2 hours). It kept everything cold, and the weight distributed well and didn't feel heavy at all. I could have probably got a few more beers in there but I would say 12-15 is a pretty good amount to throw in. Will sure beat lugging a big cooler up and down the beach.
customer_reviews.author: wareagle7298

customer_reviews.title: Not leakproof
customer_reviews.text: I bought this and a similar style cooler at the same time. Before using either, I put the same amount of ice in each, closed the top, and left them on the counter overnight. In the morning, there was water all over the counter from this backpack cooler. I recommend the Igloo version instead.
customer_reviews.author: EB

customer_reviews.title: Terrific versatile soft-sided cooler
customer_reviews.text: This is a terrific soft cooler for storing drinks and lunch. It fits very well inside a section of my backpack, so I put some blue-ice along with a couple of soda bottles and a lunch in the MIER Cooler and then put the cooler in my backpack to take to work everyday. The cooler keeps my stuff cool all day. It is ruggedly built, with high-quality zippers and compartments. I have also filled the MIER Cooler with ice and drinks and carried it around through a day at a Theme Park. It didn't leak a bit. Of course, it doesn't provide tremendous insulation, which is unreasonable to expect in a soft-sided cooler. For what it is, it is terrific.
customer_reviews.author: Rik Miller

customer_reviews.title: Great Cooler
customer_reviews.text: Used for a camping trip in Virginia for a race. Perfect size for getting through the gates. If you’ve ever been to a nascar race you know there’s a size limit for coolers in most places and you do a lot of walking. Nice to fill it up and keep your beer cold without carrying an annoying shoulder strap cooler around. Also has storage for other things, I kept my fan vision set in the pocket. Doesn’t leak unless you get too drunk and try to put it on upside down, then water comes out of the zipper. Don’t ask how I know this. Overall, great product and perfect for what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Perfect For My Work Meals
customer_reviews.text: I have had this product for a week now and so far so good. As far as I can tell this bag will do me just fine. Everything about it is exactly what I need to carry a few meals and snacks into work with me. It is the perfect size to keep me from over stuffing it with items that don't belong in a lunch cooler. I know this from experience. My past cooler bags become catch all and carry alls and in the end I have to empty them out to make room for lunch and then it starts all over again. The bag I received is well made and the thickness of the insulation is great.
customer_reviews.author: M. Azzaro

customer_reviews.title: Convenient
customer_reviews.text: I drive truck for a living. I’m out in 110+ degree weather everyday. With 5 ice packs this stays cold/cool for 10ish hours. Plenty of space for my drinks AND my food/snacks. I usually put 4 medium Gatorade bottles, 2 16.9 water bottles, 5 ice packs, a Tupperware container, small bag of chips, protein bars, and room for a small zip lock baggie of whatever. The pockets are nice and big and organized. There’s a convenient handle on top, and a strap that goes across the front to latch the backpack straps together. It doesn’t show it in the product pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Maximus Decimus Meridius

customer_reviews.title: Great product for a great price
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for kayaking or canoeing. Still had ice in my cooler the next day. I love all the capartments to prevent from losing anything on the river. I would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I use it as a lunch pack every day with no problems. The extra pockets are really handy for all of the little stuff that's usually crammed into a ziploc bag inside a hard-side cooler. It can hold a twelve-pack with freezer packs and still have room in the pockets. It's not exactly bulletproof, but I've taken it to work everyday for five months or so and seen a few rounds of disc golf with the aforementioned twelve-pack with no loose seams so far, so take that for what it's worth.
customer_reviews.author: jmp

customer_reviews.title: backpack/cooler lunch box
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, my husband needed to replace a much loved backpack/cooler lunch box which he uses for work. He was hesitant on ordering a new one especially since he couldn't get the one he had before; but this one seems to be doing the job just fine. Plenty of room, pockets, straps are durable so far, zippers are good, cooler for work use (lunch foods) is great, and comfortable to carry.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Balachowski

customer_reviews.title: Alright bag for the money
customer_reviews.text: I use the backpack for my lunch and the few things I carry around at work everyday. I’m not impressed with the quality as it seems like it’s pretty cheaply made. It hasn’t fallen apart yet but I’m not expecting it to last very long. It doesn’t have as much storage space outside of the insulated portion as I was hoping either. It’s not a terrible bag for the money though
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Good cooler. Very comfortable to carry.
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I really enjoy this product. We used it along with some highly rated ice packs for a 12 hour car ride and it kept drinks as cold as if they were in the fridge. It was very comfortable to carry as a backpack. My husband kept grabbing it like a normal cooler from the top handle and that seemed to work fine also. It’s good for events. It is normal backpack size, so a bit too large for work.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for work
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for work. I like to keep my lunch and items with me rather than store it in the fridge. Since I have allergies I fear my lunch being tampered with since I work at a large company with hundreds of people at once. Its has enough room to store keys and office supplies in it as well. Its too cold to see the durability for hiking but when it warms back up I'll update the review.
customer_reviews.author: Mix-in-it

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for a week in Orlando during the summer. Held 8 bottled waters plus enough ice to keep everything cold all day. It was small enough to not feel uncomfortable. Just be aware that it can leak through the zipper. Obvious, I know, but you may (like me) not pay attention and bend down to pick something up and then end up with ice cold melted water on your back. All in all great purchase and would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Not leakproof
customer_reviews.text: Delivered on Friday, so this weekend I filled it partially with water and ice to throw some cans in for a quick cooldown... and it started leaking immediately out of the bottom along one of the side seams. I like the design. It "appears" durable but time will tell there. I will probably keep it, vs the hassle of sending it back, and just use ice-packs in it. I am disappointed in it not being leakproof, since that is one of the first things Mier has in the title of the product.
customer_reviews.author: rxk

customer_reviews.title: Ripped at a seam with 6 12oz cans and about 1lb of ice.
customer_reviews.text: Just as the headline reads, ripped on the top cover. The size is good except the straps are a bit small and I don't have a large frame. I'll be asking for a refund as soon as I get home. Very disappointed as I hoped it would work for what I needed. You definitely get what you pay for with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Had it for only two months
customer_reviews.text: This back pack was disappointingly small when it arrived. I was hoping to do some shopping with it and ride the bus, but if I buy two or three large items there is not much room left for anything else. Seems to be made well, and I have hauled some heavy things without damaging anything. Think, though, i am going to look for a larger one. Of course the larger it is the more can fit and the heavier it will become.
customer_reviews.author: Jack G.

customer_reviews.title: It keeps things ice cold and it doesn't leak!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my boyfriend and he LOVES it. Takes it everywhere. Loads it with beers and ice and it keeps everything icy cold for hours and hours. But probably the best thing about the bag is that it doesn't leak! Additionally, it's pretty comfortable to pack on your back. I highly recommend this backpack cooler.
customer_reviews.author: S. Lisella

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, sized just right
customer_reviews.text: Accidently bought two of these, gave one to my wife and we both use ours every day for about 3 months now. Perfect size for a lunch and drinks. Keeps cool about 3-4 hours with regular ice packs, longer with a frozen water bottle in each. No quality issues, its great
customer_reviews.author: Vantard

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for hiking. Something to keep in my Jeep while I'm on the trail, so I can come back to a cold beverage. I paired this with some small thin reusable ice packs. AWESOME! I put a six pack of cans and those little blue ice packs and left for the day. It sat in my topless Jeep in 90 degree weather (it was in the shade, though) and 8 hours later when I pulled a can out, it was ice cold...like it was in an ice chest. Worked like a champ! it goes everywhere with me now.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth Olson

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Customer Service and Warranty
customer_reviews.text: Bought this back in Nov 2017 and it’s been the best insulated cooler I’ve purchased. Recently took it on a month and a half trip up the coast of Spain and had an issue with the liner leaking. Upon our return I contacted Mier and notified them of the problem. That was Friday. Less then a week later, I just unboxed a brand new free replacement. Eileen from Mier was amazing. Two year warranty isn’t common anymore and they stood by their product. Will not hesitate to buy more.
customer_reviews.author: JGC2112

customer_reviews.title: Great backpack, less than amazing quality
customer_reviews.text: Would have given this backpack 4-5 stars but it arrived with tears in the mesh water bottle pockets on both sides. Stitching of these pockets is of poor quality and they won't last long. But the backpack itself is pretty great! Fits a lot, keeps things cold for longer than expected, and is comfortable to wear (as comfortable as a backpack with an entire case of beer inside can be anyways!) I recommend for my fellow hikers who like to pack lunch and a few drinks! *Warning* zippers and inner lining are not 100% waterproof, it will leak if tipped over!
customer_reviews.author: Katelyn

customer_reviews.title: Much better than my other back pack ice chest and i like that one too.
customer_reviews.text: I love mine. It is much better than other products I purchased. Those were not too bad and came in handy but this Mier Insulted Cooler is made much stronger and after a year and 2 months has endured aot of damaging situations and no damage. HIGHLY RECCOMEND. Las Vegas, cainos in California and filling up drinks for hotel pools jas been so much easier.
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: Leaks proff,
customer_reviews.text: I love this backpack. One of the best purchases. Not to big not to small. Leak proff. Easy to clean. A lot of different packets helps organize and keep things separate. Use it all the time for water parks, mountains trips, traveling. Comfortable and durable.
customer_reviews.author: monika banas

customer_reviews.title: Strap broke before first use!
customer_reviews.text: The strap broke on this cooler the night before we were leaving on our vacation, causing us to scramble to find a different backpack cooler in a local store. All that was in in the cooler at the time were about 10 paper plates and some napkins.
customer_reviews.author: Good daughter

customer_reviews.title: This cooler does not leak like most others
customer_reviews.text: Softsided coolers usually leak once the ice melts, but not this one. Since you wear it as a bookbag the last thing you want is water dripping down your back, so this cooler is for you. After a day of beach walking or going to an outdoor concert the last thing you want is a dripping cooler on the floorboard of your car. This holds ice well and doesn't drip. The shoulder straps are well padded.
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: No leaks, very comfortable, accurate description
customer_reviews.text: Worked like a charm. Comfortable to carry even loaded up with 15 cans of beer, a few bottles of water, ice, and other goodies. Size posted was accurate and it did not leak at all. I did accidentally tip it over in the trunk of my car and it did leak out of the zipper but that should be expected. The main concern was it dripping down my back while walking around and it did not leak at all. Stayed cold over 10 hours with sufficient ice and cold drinks in over 100°F weather.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Moose

customer_reviews.title: It keeps things cold and convenient and does not leak
customer_reviews.text: I love the product and its capability. I use it for work and it fits great behind my front seat for travel use as well. I typically use an ice pack but recently used.it with an ice machine at a hotel and filled it up! It held the water through the next day and didn't leak. There was a but of condensation on the bottom but overall was very surprised that it held my water bottles and they were ice cold! Awesome. I cant wait to travel more and might look into a different style of this bag to accommodate my travel wishes. I get compliments all the time on the bag as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Still holding strong
customer_reviews.text: ✔Update 8\2019 ➡️ 5/2020 steady 9months but this ain't a baby.. it's way better. ..öriginal pôst:3 or 4 months I took it easier on this one than most it's good for a 12 pack of whatever beverage you tag along. So far this is the longest last thing cooler backpack in this price range that I've had
customer_reviews.author: NARF-J-NILLUM

customer_reviews.title: Brought on vacation to Disney and worked great for packing picnic meals at the park
customer_reviews.text: Brought on vacation to Disney and worked great for packing picnic meals at the park. Kept everything cold in June with temps in the 90s. Froze some water bottles to use as ice chillers and they were still mostly frozen hours later. Very happy with this product! Will be using it for picnics all summer!
customer_reviews.author: "momsbus"

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend the thin Cool Pack ice packs to use with ...
customer_reviews.text: Used it for the 1st time over the Memorial Day weekend. I carried 6 bottles of water, sandwiches and ice packs and everything kept cold for a long time. I would recommend the thin Cool Pack ice packs to use with it as I could surround my items with these packs to keep everything cold and no need for ice.
customer_reviews.author: Anne L.

customer_reviews.title: RE: Perfect size for lunch and then some.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent design and easy to carry. Great carry straps for backpack. Well designed and well made.
customer_reviews.author: Astute shopper

customer_reviews.title: A hot then cool backpack!
customer_reviews.text: A convenient insulated backpack that respects my needs to have the duality of a cool and hot carrier for my food. The biggest advantage is the sternum strap. On those hard working days that when my arms give out and it feels like my arms are posthumously doing the Naruto Run, it's a relief to have that security knowing that your bag won't slide off.
customer_reviews.author: Al Del

customer_reviews.title: Very helpful
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my fiance to use as a lunch box for work. He likes it because it helps keep his hands free while walking to his shop, (1/4 mile from parking lot) he loves having less to carry. Plus, he has a coffee cup that he used to just have to throw in his old lunch box when empty and it would ALWAYS make the inside gross. This one has a convenient drink pocket on the side.
customer_reviews.author: Amber hartweck

customer_reviews.title: LEAKS!!
customer_reviews.text: I love a backpack cooler but this one although very nicely made it leaks!! No point to a backpack cooler if it wont hold water. Too bad, I was really excited it is nice looking, well made, well designed with the pockets and straps if only it didn't leak.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Doria

customer_reviews.title: Loved this sturdy hands-free backpack cooler
customer_reviews.text: Loved this product. It came just in time for my trip to the beach and we all had nice cold beverages while sitting in our chairs on the beach. Love having my hands free to carry all the stuff you have to carry.
customer_reviews.author: Jill Weinischke

customer_reviews.title: Must Buy. Great for Vacations.
customer_reviews.text: Best backpack cooler Ever. It does not leak and it keeps food and drinks cold. Ice lasted 24 hours inside the backpack. 36 hours later water inside the cooler was still cold.
customer_reviews.author: Romero Family

customer_reviews.title: Good for a day at the beach
customer_reviews.text: This does exactly what it's designed to do. Good for a day at the beach, on the boat, or road trip. The zipper is not sealed and will leak if tipped over or laying on its side. I put a freezable ice pack in mine and that solved the issue. Comfortable to carry and adjusts for petite adults. I do wish it came in other colors.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great cooler bag
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for picnics at the park, hikes and beach days. Its a nice size. Lots of pockets and space to put keys, etc. Over very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Glo_Elisa117

customer_reviews.title: This one has held up better then the rest.
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd cooler back pack, I went with "Price" vs quality before. Well I should have bought this from day one. It is holding up great to a lot of wear and tare. We will see how it is at 6 months + .
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Moyer

customer_reviews.title: Little smaller than I wanted
customer_reviews.text: This is a little smaller than I expected, but it still holds at least 18 cans and cozies, wine opener, small travel alcohol bottles, etc. If I bring wine instead, I can put that in with ice and it does not leak unless it falls sideways and the water comes through the zipper section.
customer_reviews.author: PRBabe5

customer_reviews.title: Durable, lasted over a yr!!
customer_reviews.text: This bag was used for lunch and sodas 5 days a week and it is still usable a year and 3 months later... but the zipper is broke so kinda useless now cuz stuff falls out if it’s not zipped... but lasted forever and still looks good nothing else wrong just the zipper broke.
customer_reviews.author: DHurtado

customer_reviews.title: It is a ok bag
customer_reviews.text: This item's box is broken they use the clear tape to reseal the box since the original broken. The bag left size is a little higher than the right size, and it looks like a very cheap made bag. It is not desert the money.
customer_reviews.author: Baorun Huang

customer_reviews.title: Great cooler
customer_reviews.text: We use these for sports tournaments. Fill it up with waters, a lunch & snacks to save money on concession stand junk. It holds a lot! Front pockets hold more than I thought they would. Easy to clean. Straps make it comfortable to carry even when loaded with water bottles! Nice golden color. It is hard to gage how cold it kept everything since we are constantly in & out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Verbos

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable to carry all day
customer_reviews.text: Used this for a few day/beach trips. No complaints, it didn’t leak (but I used ice packs/packaged ice), the straps were really comfortable and it holds a decent amount of food/beverages.
customer_reviews.author: MEGAN

customer_reviews.title: like I am
customer_reviews.text: Works for me! I use mine at work, outside, in direct sunlight, all weather. It keeps ice and my drinks cold for quite a few hours. All the melted ice water stays in the container. Just don’t tip it. Even when zipped is closed it will leak liquid thru the zipper. Although it doesn’t leak thru the bottom, be prepared for condensation on the very bottom of the backpack, if you’re in a humid place, like I am.
customer_reviews.author: RJL

customer_reviews.title: I love it. Spacious and good quality material
customer_reviews.text: I love it. Spacious and good quality material. Really happy with my Purchase. Took me a while to find something as big for allthe stuff I take with me to work daily.
customer_reviews.author: Markie

customer_reviews.title: I use this daily
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for the beach but found myself using it daily for groceries. It's very sturdy. I've had it for over 6 months and its holding strong. It doesn't leak. Keeps cold in. Cleans well, is durable. And it's comfortable to wear with a lot of weight in it. Def buying some as xmas gifts
customer_reviews.author: Sweetestmuffins

customer_reviews.title: Does the trick.
customer_reviews.text: Good size and, indeed, a leak-proof liner. Insulation adequate for other than long-term storage - this is not an ice chest.
customer_reviews.author: golfer299

customer_reviews.title: The zipper broke so fast!!
customer_reviews.text: Just The zipper broke so fast and had to use it with broken zipper for a while.wish the seller contact me and send me a new one as I use it for work and suppose to work for at least for few years!
customer_reviews.author: Wayland wagner

customer_reviews.title: Nice backpack cooler with plenty of space.
customer_reviews.text: Great backpack cooler. It is sturdy and roomy. It is large enough to hold a couple large bottles or water(or even wine/liquor). Plus plenty of space for food. The backpack design makes it easy to carry.
customer_reviews.author: stmaddy

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for and found!  Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely excellent! Fits my large 24oz water bottles easily, and standing up, and still keeps the ice in them, while still having more than enough room for food. Then, you can carry it around by hand or as a backpack, it is amazingly versatile and perfect in performance!
customer_reviews.author: Johanna

customer_reviews.title: Not bad, a bit small.
customer_reviews.text: Kept everything cold, does the job. Back pack is a bit small. Sholder straps are a bit uncomfortable as the backpack gets heavier.
customer_reviews.author: J. Gaytan

customer_reviews.title: Only had it for a month but it's great so far.
customer_reviews.text: Will try to update after some time, but I've taken this on several long bike rides and it's very comfortable and works great. I would like more little pockets and storage for non-cooler items but this was the best design I could find and so far I love it.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Great quality product
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this cooler backpack! I have found this to be a great lunch bag for work. The top handle makes it easy to carry with one arm if you choose not to wear it as a backpack. Be careful not to let it tip over... it will leak through the zipper.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya

customer_reviews.title: Zipper stitching came apart but was replaced by seller
customer_reviews.text: owned it for 9 months and the stitching came apart on the top zipper...but after contacting the vendor they replaced it fully....thank you for that
customer_reviews.author: MiamiAA

customer_reviews.title: Backpack Of Ice
customer_reviews.text: Pretty Good Product I pack it pretty tight and small books in one of the zipped areas. Its very comfortable to wear around even with as much as I pack it.
customer_reviews.author: Robert T. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Best value for the price. Keeps my drinks and food cold. I use 4 ice packs. 2 on the bottom and 2 in the middle. Best backpack cooler that i bought. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: joseph pala

customer_reviews.title: Not a quality made product.
customer_reviews.text: I used this product once! The stitching is coming out around the top of the cooler exposing the silver lining. Seriously? This was not a cheap item. I am not very happy at all!
customer_reviews.author: Richard D. New

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: Great cooler for kayaking. Keeps stuff pretty cold. Easy access and perfect to carry.
customer_reviews.author: BlueFire

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for your money!
customer_reviews.text: I have used this pack hiking and one trips, it is great! It has been very useful and I would purchase it again. It does not hurt my back or shoulders and keeps all the drinks and snacks cold.
customer_reviews.author: Aurora Willman

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for construction
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend is in construction and the reviews brought me into the purchase. I will update this later when it has been used for a couple of months but so far, brand new, its everything plus! Thanks for a well made, put together product
customer_reviews.author: Gemini Rose

customer_reviews.title: Just what you need
customer_reviews.text: Perfect bag! Comfortable, well made, cleans easily, sturdy. We used it several days a week to the beach and boat & it has held up very well
customer_reviews.author: Coastal247

customer_reviews.title: Cool bag
customer_reviews.text: Bigger than expected, but I really like it. Seems sturdy. Nice side pouches and nice zipper pockets. I use it for work/lunch.
customer_reviews.author: Ren

customer_reviews.title: Not leakproof
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this cooler for my husband in April. He uses it daily, it mostly sits on the passenger seat of his car. In the last month it has started to leak a lot. The issue, beside leaking, is that the back is padded so it absorbs all the cold water and then it runs down your back when you put it on. The concept is great, the execution, not so great.
customer_reviews.author: Abby

customer_reviews.title: Nice lunch box
customer_reviews.text: I use it as a lunch box, I wish there were more compartments or places to clip on various items, like an umbrella.
customer_reviews.author: John in Tampa

customer_reviews.title: Good bag for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Ive used the backpack for work, like a lunchbox. The bag has held up pretty good and it easy to wipe down the inside when i have anything spills.
customer_reviews.author: Diana V

customer_reviews.title: Great! NO LEAKING! Love it!
customer_reviews.text: We’ve used this cooler backpack a few times. It is great doesn’t sweat and doesn’t leak. I love it and plan to buy a second for my husband. I’m excited to use it at the beach this summer
customer_reviews.author: Dawn P.

customer_reviews.title: Great bag!
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag. This is a great insulated bag. I filled it up with a little ice and had drinks and snacks and stayed chilled for the whole day. Exceeding expectations for sure. If you're looking for a bag for a trip, you can't go wrong with this one!
customer_reviews.author: Long Cap

customer_reviews.title: 6 months later and still in great shape
customer_reviews.text: I’m in my car all day for work and needed a large but easy to transport lunchbag. I can fit 3 large solid ice packs, 6 bottles of water, and my lunch and snacks. It’s tight but it will keep it cold all day, even in 100 degree weather. The mesh side pockets do have some wear but otherwise my abuse to this backpack hasn’t affected anything else! I highly recommend this for anyone who needs a large, easy to transport, ice chest/lunch bag.
customer_reviews.author: Janelle

customer_reviews.title: Buy it
customer_reviews.text: Have been using this backpack as my lunch box in commercial construction for the past 6 months or so and it has held up amazingly well. I stuff the crap out of this thing and it gets used and abused. Keeps my ice packs frozen for most of the day.
customer_reviews.author: Herbie Hancock

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: It’s just right not too big not small plenty of pockets to store my cell phone and charger. I recommend this cooler backpack.
customer_reviews.author: MeMo LoKs

customer_reviews.title: Good choice for backpacking cold items
customer_reviews.text: I recently ordered one with the intent to carry cans while walking around. The straps are very comfortable and form fitting, should be fine for any size. The thickness of the bag is nice enough to keep inside cool for a few hours at minimum without your back feeling cold or wet. About the storage. Realistically here you can carry 16-18(pushing it with 18) 12 oz cans with ice. The loop straps for the top look dainty, I wouldn't habitually pull those to open and close, better off just going straight from the zipper. The side compartments aren't bad, but not much netting to allow a deep well. Overall it's a solid choice for a backpack cooler.
customer_reviews.author: Valeras Riggleman

customer_reviews.title: Leaks !
customer_reviews.text: This product is not what is described in the print. Leaks bad and the ice melts very quickly. I would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Scott McMillan

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: Very functional product. I use it daily for work. It rides well in the front floor board too as a bonus! Just a little bulky for the small human.
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: Excellent cooler backpack
customer_reviews.text: This cooler fits my needs perfectly. I've had it for a week now and so far I just love it. It's comfortable enough to carry and it holds a lot without being super bulky. The side pockets hold a 40 oz water bottle just fine.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: This worked great on a super hot day
customer_reviews.text: This worked great on a super hot day. I was worried about leaking so I used frozen water bottles to keep everything cold. The water bottles barely thawed despite super hot temps.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen

customer_reviews.title: Great cooler backpack
customer_reviews.text: I'm loving this backpack cooler combo. I bought it to take to sporting events. I don't like having a purse. This has enough space for several water bottles and snacks. I keep wetwipes, bug spray and sunscreen in the side pockets. Everything stays compact and easy to find. Started using if for lots more than sports.
customer_reviews.author: Hillary Stapf

customer_reviews.title: This makes a great lunchbox. Keeps melted ice inside
customer_reviews.text: This makes a great lunchbox. Keeps melted ice inside, keeps lunch cool and works very nicely. Convenient to carry & open. I use it every day.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Terrible liner
customer_reviews.text: This product was great at first but after a few uses, the liner ripped.
customer_reviews.author: Allison B

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, needs better strap design for comfort
customer_reviews.text: To flimsy ,needs to be more stiff,good quality,but bad design, seems top heavy pulls at you shoulder too much, does not carry comfortably, strap buckles ride to high, above arm pit
customer_reviews.author: Dee Carter

customer_reviews.title: Nice cooler
customer_reviews.text: Nice cooler. Great size for my needs. Was very pleased with how well it was insulated and the quality of construction.
customer_reviews.author: John Q. Public

customer_reviews.title: Can hold ice.
customer_reviews.text: Very useful for anyone who is eating on the go. Having a backpack lunch box vs over the shoulder leaves your hands free to continue to your location before having to immediately take care of the lunch container. Great price and holds temp well with small amount of cooling.
customer_reviews.author: Ken K.

customer_reviews.title: Very well made.
customer_reviews.text: I been using every day for over 3 months, very good backpack, very well made, never leak and if you put a frozen water bottle will be cold for over 10 hours even in the summer on Florida heat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Leaks
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this just a few weeks ago..It leaks at the bottom. Down my back..down my legs. I purchased this cooler because I purchased another a year ago to take to the beach...that cooler was great!!! Do not know if the company changes manufactures or what...
customer_reviews.author: David Womacks

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Great little backpack that has many uses. Can’t believe the low price on this gem. Would recommend to the biker, hiker, hunter or fisherman.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Brooks

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: This thing has been through it and I am happy to report, it makes me so happy About to buy 2 more for when we have more people to feed and beverage. I holds heavy loads and does not break or leak. Almost most 4 years of traveling all over and in perfect condition.
customer_reviews.author: eri haskins

customer_reviews.title: like the size
customer_reviews.text: like the size, put ice in it tends to get wet on the bottom, now put ice in a freezer zip lock bag.
customer_reviews.author: grandslam!

customer_reviews.title: Durable, Chic, and Functional Backpack!
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect insulated backpack! It's super comfortable on your back, holds lots of food/drinks, and keeps them cool. Great for picnics, boat outings, sporting events, etc!!
customer_reviews.author: P h

customer_reviews.title: Works well but leaks first time use
customer_reviews.text: Bag feels strong and looks great but it leaks after the first time. I'm going to use a plastic shopping bag as a liner next time.
customer_reviews.author: AL

customer_reviews.title: Great mid-sized cooler bag.
customer_reviews.text: Fits full size bottles (I.e. Pellegrino, Soda stream, etc.). Keeps refrigerated food cold without an ice pack when used indoors. Ice pack needed for outdoor use. Straps are super comfortable. Size is larger than a typical daily lunch bag. Although, that is what I use it for because insulated lunch bags are too small for glass containers.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Bought this as a Christmas gift for my room mate ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a Christmas gift for my room mate, that rides a bike to work everyday. He says he really likes it.
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: 👌
customer_reviews.text: Perfect handle on top for easy carry or shoulder straps. Waterproof interior is very large! Exactly what we were looking for!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cooler
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves his color. He takes it to work with him everyday and it is able to withstand the wear of an industrial setting. He also is able to pack it with food for his ten hour shifts. Works great and would totally buy again.
customer_reviews.author: The Milligans

customer_reviews.title: Great product 👌
customer_reviews.text: It was given as a gift he loved it keep up the good work :)
customer_reviews.author: Mo

customer_reviews.title: Great Cooler
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful little insulated backpack. Looks great, comfortable on the shoulders. But remember it seems to fit smaller shoulders.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.text: Like everything about this backpack , purchased March 2019 . But it does leak , not sure how to go about contacting the seller but it’s weird because the pack leaks sometimes and I can’t pin point why. So when it doesn’t leak it’s handy and is roomy and the straps hold up well . Would recommend if it didn’t leak on me. Not sure if I got a faulty one
customer_reviews.author: Angeline

product_meta.title: MIER Insulated Lunch Backpack Leakproof Soft Cooler for Men Women to Beach, Travel, Picnic, Hiking, Work,24Can/30Can
feature_bullets: Insulated and Leakproof Cooler ---- The inner thicken insulation and leakproof PEVA liner work together to keep things cold/hot for hours, easy to clean and storage when not use

Large capacity Lunch Backpack ---- Deep main compartment holds 24 cans, roomy enough to pack meals, beer, snacks even tall beverages. Great partner for day trip, theme park, beach, picnic, camping, fishing
Multiple pockets ---- 1 inside mesh pocket on the lid, 2 side mesh pockets, 1 large front zipper pocket with mesh divider to keep utensils; 1 smaller outside zipper pocket for extra storage
Durable & Comfortable to wear ---- Dual adjustable padded shoulder straps and thick padding in the back allow for maximum comfort and support. Extra top padded handle for easy carrying

Sturdy Material ---- Heavy duty fabric construction but lightweight(1.34lb), wear-resistant; High quality zipper, solid and easy to pull. Exterior size: 11”L X 7.9”W X 13.8”(front of bag) - 15.7"(back of bag) deep; Interior size: 10.6”L X 7”W X 11.8"(front of bag) - 13.4"(back of bag) deep
